intro.page: Use the Letter images at the bottom of your screen to start planting with the letter 'A'
Great job! Now that you've grown some 'A's, lets try planting some 'T's
Now you're getting it! Lets grow some 'C's and you'll have enough letters to start building something
Use the Word images to build a 'cat' factory
Yay! Building words from letters is what Phoenicia is all about!
Here's a new letter: 'H', you can use it with your other letters to build the word 'hat'
You're doing great! Now that you have the hang of it, here's some more letters and words that you can grown and build.
Keeping building words and you'll reach new levels, each new level will open up new letters and words for you to use.
